mapper.select: SELECT b.board_no, b.board_title, b.board_count, b.board_regdate, b.board_reco, b.member_no, b.board_reco, m.member_nickname FROM BOARD b INNER JOIN MEMBER m ON b.member_no = m.member_no WHERE b.CAT_NO = 3 AND board_deleted = '0';
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (board_title, board_content, member_no, cat_no) VALUES (#{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{memberNo}, 3 )
mapper.select: SELECT b.board_no, b.board_title, b.board_count, b.board_regdate, b.board_reco, b.board_nreco, b.board_singo, b.member_no, b.board_content, m.member_nickname FROM BOARD b INNER JOIN MEMBER m ON b.member_no = m.member_no WHERE b.board_no = #{ boardNo } AND board_deleted = '0'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM IMAGE WHERE board_no = #{ boardNO }
DELETE FROM FILE WHERE board_no = #{ boardNO }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IMAGE (board_no, image_path, image_real, image_size) VALUES (#{boardNo}, #{imagePath}, #{imageReal}, #{imageSize})
INSERT INTO FILE (board_no, file_path, file_real, file_size) VALUES (#{boardNo}, #{filePath}, #{fileReal}, #{fileSize})
